column71:
comment:"I am not too happy with service. This was my 1st order for Daraz. Following are observations.
1- I ordered 11 august and received on 23 august. I got product after 12 days. These are the peak hot days in Lahore. If I purchased local market I received the same day with installation. No doubt I saved around 6k to 8k. But some time importance is delivery with immediately.
2- Packing is good. All parts are complete. No any damage.
3- The AC pipe color is black not looking fresh peace. see the attachment
"}
